welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Houten, a charming Dutch city known for its picturesque canal views and vibrant cycling culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
